author: Billy Perrigo
title: How Coronavirus Fears Have Amplified a Baseless But Dangerous 5G Conspiracy Theory
description: Anxieties over the growing coronavirus pandemic are making people increasingly susceptible to misinformation, with conspiracy theories linking 5G wireless technology to COVID-19 gaining traction in recent weeks. The conspiracy has been spread by celebrities, …
